```{r setup message = FALSE, include = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(socviz)
library(sf)
library(rgdal)
library(broom)
```

```{r load-data, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE}
CRgdb <- st_read(dsn = "data/WDPA_Apr2022_Public/WDPA_Apr2022_Public.gdb",
                 layer = "WDPA_poly_Apr2022")
```

```{r clean-data}
tidyCR <- tibble(CRgdb) %>%
  filter(ISO3 == "CRI")

cleanCR <- tidyCR %>%
  filter(STATUS == "Designated") %>%
  select(WDPAID, NAME, DESIG_ENG, DESIG_TYPE, MARINE, GIS_AREA,
         STATUS_YR, GOV_TYPE, OWN_TYPE, SHAPE)
```

```{r quick-analysis}
cleanCR %>%
  count(GOV_TYPE)

cleanCR %>%
  count(OWN_TYPE)

cleanCR %>%
  count(DESIG_ENG)

cleanCR %>%
  count(MARINE)
```
